#AcuteMyeloidLeukemia (AML) is the most common form of acute leukemia. @EIUPerspectives reviewed #AML care across five European countries, including factors that play a part in the development of high-quality services for patients. The report was sponsored by #Amgen. #ASH19

An #AML diagnosis is life threatening and life changing. Read the @EIUPerspectives report sponsored by #Amgen that explores a number of factors that play a part in the development of high-quality services for patients with AML. #acutemyeloidleukemia #ASH19

#Amgen is proud to sponsor this report: "Acute Myeloid Leukaemia: Mapping the policy response to an acute cancer in France, Germany, Italy, Spain and the UK." @EIUPerspectives looked at the incidence, diagnosis, treatment and costs of #AcuteMyeloidLeukemia (#AML). #ASH19

One of the biggest problems created by #osteoporosis is fractures or bone breaks, which may be the first visible sign of disease in patients. Each year ~1.5M individuals in the U.S. suffer from a fracture due to osteoporosis. #BoneHealthTakeAction https://t.co/EOmfoveHsc
[POLL] What do you think is the most important risk factor of #osteoporosis? #BoneHealthTakeAction

Bone breaks due to #osteoporosis send more women 55+ in the U.S. to the hospital than heart attacks, strokes or breast cancer. One opinion: screen, diagnose and treat before the break. #BoneHealthTakeAction

With more than 20 years of #osteoporosis research experience, #Amgen is a leader in bone health and committed to working with organizations to improve medical care of those with osteoporosis, which is a serious, chronic condition. #BoneHealthTakeAction https://t.co/F32E8cHQhH
[QUIZ] How many fractures/bone breaks are caused by #osteoporosis each year in the U.S.? #BoneHealthTakeAction https://t.co/XiHbQhCTFf

#Osteoporosis is often a silent disease that cannot always be seen or felt & can go undetected until a fracture occurs. At #Amgen, we believe in a predict and prevent model‚Äîscreen, diagnose and treat‚Äîbefore a fracture occurs. #BoneHealthTakeAction

1 in 2 women 50+ in the U.S. will experience a bone break due to #osteoporosis. This is higher than worldwide statistics. Why? Today, we are hosting advocates, experts and doctors to help address the healthcare gaps in osteoporosis. #BoneHealthTakeAction https://t.co/2ImCsroG6N
